Charge Class Reference

Charge API. More...

#include <Charge.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class provides access to the device's charging status.

Definition at line 15 of file Charge.hpp.

Static Public Member Functions

static bool power ()
 Returns true if charging power is present.
 
static bool stat ()
 Returns true if batteries are charging.
 
static bool slow ()
 Returns true if charging slow (ie connected to a USB data port)
 
static bool fast ()
 Returns true if charging fast (ie connected to a USB power adapter)
